column4: the comments in the bug for your issue is usually where you can get some answers
give me a link
it's not like i havent spend many hours of my life searching google already
you said you were sure one was filed.
bugs.ubuntu.com
that's not helpful
why is it a keyring issue?
it is.  Search for your issue.  "samba sharing is broken" isn't a helpful description even if someone was willing to search for you
it is broken though!
sharing doesnt work -- what more can i say?
http://www.jonathanmoeller.com/screed/?p=181
start with that then.  And compare the bug reports about broken sharing to your situation
that's the first hit on google. so i see more and more poeopel are having the same problem
there is not much more to say. the silly ubuntu maintainer who broke iit nows needs to step up
open source is a two way street between users and developers.  I don't understand why you would prefer to rant instead of helping with the bug process
how do you propose i help? it's been months since this bug came about
link me to the bug
report
i pasted a link already
to the bug report?  Sorry, I didn't see it.  Can you link again?
i dont know.
this is my point.  The best place for you to get insight into your issue and to help in solving it is bugs.ubuntu.com
i'll have a look now
https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+bug/235622
